title: Someone hacked into my main, $200 worth of rp and a ban later?? HELP
body:
So i put in a ticket on Monday about my account being hacked and 200$ worth of rp was purchased using my info while i was at work (not from my computer) 

P.S When trying to log onto the account it says wrong region (even after trying to log on this account through all the regions i get the same message)
(yes I've changed the password after finding out I've been hacked) )

So today i get home from work and i get an email saying that my account has been banned for violating league terms of use (VERY hard to do when you're locked out of your account btw riot) 

Anyway if anyone can help, I just want to know if my ticket is still being reviewed or if i have to put in yet ANOTHER ticket for the account ban?

replies.body: Due to the nature of sensitive account information, we'd like to help you out individually with your specific issue.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help with recovery and reparations.  We'll respond asap!

But the ticket isn't for this account and i don't want to have to many tickets placed already because i thought that delayed everything. 

Side note: the account was also put into a different region and i tried logging into each and every region but none of them worked? so i have no idea which region it is in. so i don't know how to fill out the form entirely

If you already have a ticket open, your best bet is to wait for the specialist to reach out.  Just make sure not to bump your ticket, as doing so could drop you back to the bottom of the queue.  Indeed, it won't be necessary to make another ticket as that would cause confusion.  Hang tight!

(sorry to be taking up so much of your time i just really wanted some answers)

But after they reach back to me and if anything is settled do i have to put in yet another ticket afterwards to get my account back to being unbanned???
Once the account is secured and back in your hands, they'll unban it. It's part of the process.
